characterization.SC-XRD: Bruker X8 PROSPECTOR APEX2 CCD diffractometer, Cu Kα radiation (λ = 1.54178 Å)
characterization.PXRD: PANalytical X’Pert PRO diffractometer, Cu Kα (λ = 1.5418 Å)
characterization.TGA: TA Q500 apparatus, under O2 flow (25 mL min−1), heating rate of 5°C min−1
characterization.VT-PXRD: PANalytical X’Pert MPD-PRO X-ray diffractometer, Anton-Parr CHC+ variable-temperature stage
characterization.VH-PXRD: PANalytical X’Pert MPD-PRO X-ray diffractometer, MHG Modular Humidity Generator
characterization.TG-DSC: SENSYS evo TG-DSC instrument (Setaram Instrumentation), sample activated under N2 flow at 55°C for 12 h
